title: What Does the 🥑 Avocado Emoji Mean?

steps.title: You follow trends.
steps.content: You follow trends. If your friend sends you a 🥑, it could be them calling you “basic” in a sarcastic way. Maybe you’ve been raving about pumpkin spice lattes, or you’re all over a mainstream band. Flowing with stereotypes and societal “norms” isn’t bad. You like what you like, and that’s perfectly okay! [1] X Research source “You’re such an 🥑.” “🥑 = you”

steps.title: You have a healthy lifestyle.
steps.content: You have a healthy lifestyle. Avocados are a nutritiously rich food. The 🥑 can become a symbol for health when it’s paired with talk about food or fitness. Maybe someone uses it to caption a picture of them eating a healthy brunch, or your friend sends it in a text saying they want to go vegan. Chances are, if you see an 🥑, health is involved. [2] X Research source “Nothing better than a healthy meal 🥑” “Veganuary here I come🥑”

steps.title: You’re the better half of a relationship.
steps.content: You’re the better half of a relationship. An 🥑 can be used on Snapchat to show your relationship status. There are two halves of sliced avocado like there are two people in a relationship, and you just happen to be the better half. This is a funny and clever way to tell people you’re taken while goofing around with your partner. [3] X Research source “Sally Jane🥑” “I’m definitely the 🥑”

steps.title: You love all things avocado.
steps.content: You love all things avocado. Is there anything better than guacamole and avocado toast? An 🥑 can be as simple as saying, “I love avocados!” If you see this emoji and a picture of food made with avocado, chances are someone really likes avocados. “🥑🥑 for days!!” “Taco night baby!🥑”

steps.title: Use it as a placeholder.
steps.content: Use it as a placeholder. Sometimes you don’t want to write out a word. Text an 🥑 rather than spelling out “avocado” to make your text shorter and more playful. “Taco night isn’t the same without 🥑” “I really need to stop spending all my money on 🥑😳”

steps.title: Embrace your simplicity.
steps.content: Embrace your simplicity. There’s nothing wrong with liking pumpkin spice lattes and Uggs! Throw an 🥑 into your captions or texts for comedic self-awareness. “Yes, I’m 🥑” “If liking pumpkin spice makes me 🥑, so be it.”

steps.title: Talk about your health goals.
steps.content: Talk about your health goals. Show off your balanced lifestyle with an 🥑. Post a picture of you working out or cooking a healthy meal with a caption of your goals. “New record today! Feeling good🥑💪” “Cutting out junk food was the best thing I ever did🥑”

steps.title: Flirt with your partner.
steps.content: Flirt with your partner. An 🥑 can put you both in a romantic mood. Add this food emoji to the end of a flirtatious message to say, “I’m the better half of the relationship.” It’s sure to cause some playful banter! “Love you boo🥑❤️” “Would you say I’m the 🥑?”

steps.title: Add other emojis to the 🥑 emoji to create new meanings.
steps.content: Add other emojis to the 🥑 emoji to create new meanings. Pair this food emoji with other food emojis, smiley faces, or activity emojis. Check out some of these common combinations to see how you can spice up your texts and social media captions: 🥑🏋️ = Working on a healthy lifestyle 😋🥑❤️ = Avocados are your favorite food 🥑👌 = The perfect avocado 🌯🥑 = Burrito with avocado 🥑​🥕​🌽​ = Veggie salad 🥑🍞 = Avocado toast 🥑😉 = The better half of a relationship 🥑💁‍♀️ = Basic gal
